name: Will G Watters
text:
Tell me to #ignore the voices
That echo in these four corners
Of this cold room I breathe in
All this noise keeps happening
Whether I like it or not
Trying to find a way out
Searching for the door
There isn't any escape from here
Not until my mind doesn't think anymore.

#vsspoem

* blackout blinders

Absolutely worth it. My best productivity hack, a clear mind.

I was eager to see a student being offered a CGPA upgrade as reward for "cold room" duties.
Those are the kind of scandals that qualify for #SexForGrades.
I wanted to see lecturer/s coercing students into doing all of this.
It wasn't the case.

text:
I wanted to see a lecturer telling a students that she will never pass his exam unless he comes to play with him in the "cold room".
